description: T(2n+1,n), where T is the array in A055830.
formula: a(n) = 3*A055834(n) for n>=1. - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Jan 25 2014a(n) = sum(k=0..n, (sum(i=k..n, binomial(i,k)*binomial(i+1,n-i)))*binomial(n,k)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Mar 01 2014
prog: (Maxima) a(n):=sum((sum(binomial(i,k)*binomial(i+1,n-i),i,k,n))*binomial(n,k),k,0,n); /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Mar 01 2014 */(PARI) a(n) = if(n==0, 1, 3*sum(k=0, n, binomial(n+k-1, n)*binomial(k, n-k)) ); \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Mar 01 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2000
